projectGridLines.stationName: Grasim Industries Ltd - Pulp & Fibre Business - CRM, Mumbai
projectGridLines.title: Implementation of Customer Access Portal in CRM
projectGridLines.description:
Responsibilities:

  • Analyse customer requirements for a single window to access all their engagement details (invoicing, orders, SOA, issues etc.)   
  • Map these requirements in CRM along with the process flow. 
  • Plan implementation of Customer Access Portal including training to customers and any support needed in collaboration with the Sales Teams
  • Collaborate with IT/partner to facilitate changes / issue resolution etc. 


Learning Opportunities:

  • Gain hands-on experience of Microsoft D365 CRM
  • Acquire knowledge focused on sales process 
  • Learn about the implementation of CRM 


Requirements:

  • Sales / Marketing, IT 
  • Strong communication and liaison skills.
